modShortDescription: This mod adds slingshot weapon to the game.
modDescription:
This mod adds slingshot [weapon](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/7-days-to-die-weapons/) to the game.

## Changelog

* **_(new)_** Added a deer slingshot. You need to kill the deer and get the deer head before you can make it.
* Fixed ammo problem.

**[Download](https://budingserver.lanzoux.com/ii978hvqqni)**

The forum topic of the mod is [here](https://community.7daystodie.com/topic/17782-slingshot/).

**Credits:** Huannan5300
